constraints.value: {ND-LotsGroup} ${number:BT-157-LotsGroup <= sum(for text:$groupID in BT-137-LotsGroup, number:$lotValue in BT-27-Lot[BT-137-Lot in BT-1375-Procedure[(BT-330-Procedure == $groupID) and (BT-765-Lot in ('fa-mix','fa-w-rc','fa-wo-rc'))]] return $lotValue)}

{ND-TenderingParty} ${every text:$tax in /OPT-301-Lot-FiscalLegis satisfies $tax not in OPT-301-Tenderer-SubCont}
{ND-TenderingParty} ${every text:$doc in /OPT-301-Lot-DocProvider satisfies $doc not in OPT-301-Tenderer-SubCont}
{ND-TenderingParty} ${every text:$reviewInfo in /OPT-301-Lot-ReviewInfo satisfies $reviewInfo not in OPT-301-Tenderer-SubCont}
{ND-TenderingParty} ${every text:$recepient in /OPT-301-Lot-TenderReceipt satisfies $recepient not in OPT-301-Tenderer-SubCont}
{ND-TenderingParty} ${every text:$eval in /OPT-301-Lot-TenderEval satisfies $eval not in OPT-301-Tenderer-SubCont}
{ND-TenderingParty} ${every text:$sign in /OPT-300-Contract-Signatory satisfies $sign not in OPT-301-Tenderer-SubCont}
{ND-TenderingParty} ${every text:$fund in /OPT-301-LotResult-Financing satisfies $fund not in OPT-301-Tenderer-SubCont}
{ND-TenderingParty} ${every text:$pay in /OPT-301-LotResult-Paying satisfies $pay not in OPT-301-Tenderer-SubCont}
{ND-Organization} ${every text:$ubo in OPT-302-Organization satisfies ($ubo in OPT-202-UBO)}
{ND-LotResult} ${every text:$contract in OPT-315-LotResult satisfies ($contract in OPT-316-Contract)}
{ND-LotResult} ${every text:$tender in OPT-320-LotResult satisfies ($tender in OPT-321-Tender)}
